item.description:
We are cross-promoting this important event. This is a hands-on workshop to show us all how to survive the tumultuous financial times we expect to see ahead. We know that most 911 truth movement people are aware of the problems with the central banking system - this workshop is about the SOLUTIONS!
============================

The Alternatives Expo has organized 2 Community Currency workshops on this Boston Tea Party '08 weekend:

Boston - Saturday 13Dec (other announcement) and this event in:
Bristol, New-Hampshire on Monday, 15 December 2008:

[size=12pt]The Power of Community
Kick-starting Local Currency Initiatives

Ivy's Spice of Life Restaurant - (directions)
8 Central Square
Bristol, New-Hampshire 03222
(603) 744-3210

10AM-6PM (schedule details will be updated at the AltExpo website)
Networking and party afterwards

Sessions include:
Liberty Dollar
Free Lakota Bank
Time-based money systems
Shire Silver
Community Outreach
Consensus meeting skills
Community interface
"Nuts and bolts" of local money

Videos:
Money as Debt
Zeitgeist Addendum (money section)
and others

Be sure to attend the Boston Tea Party 08 event Sunday at Faneuil Hall!

Volunteers are needed for all events and host lodging offers are appreciated for out-of-town speakers and attenders - We have a special need for a videographer to record the proceedings.
write seminars@AltExpo.org if you can volunteer to help in any way, including carpooling.
Donations at the events are appreciated to cover costs.

This seminar will include many things covered Saturday in Boston, but will have several additional features. Be sure to bring friends you think should learn more about how the money system works and that would like to learn an "alternative."
item.how_to_find_us: one of the long-haired, bespectacled guys
item.name: Community Currency Workshop - Bristol, N.H.
